# bookingIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The unique identifier associated with the initial reservation data.

## Declaration

```swift
var bookingIdentifier: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Prior to booking, your Intents extension provides a set of potential reservation options in the form of [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRestaurantReservationBooking] objects, each of which contains a unique booking identifier. When the user selects a reservation time, this property receives the booking identifier from the corresponding [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRestaurantReservationBooking] object. Use that value to get the details about the reservation option chosen by the user.

## Getting the Booking Details

- **bookingDateComponents**: The date and time of the reservation.
- **partySize**: The total number of people in the user’s party.
- **guest**: The identity of the guest associated with the reservation.
